item.title: How to resolve a case using Flow
item.description: In a classic workflow it is quite easy to resolve a case, because we can just update the status as a step in the workflow. To my surprise, when I tried to use the same logic in Flow by updating the Status and Status Reason fields, this didn’t work.

item.title: Sending Emails with Flow
item.description: A common steps to use in a Dynamics CRM workflow is Send email. This is pretty straightforward: in this single step you can define the sender, recipient(s), body and all other available fields of the email entity.
